attributes.action: Allow bus passes issued in England to be used in Scotland and those issued in Scotland to be used in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention (from Bridlington bus station) that when the new bus passes come into use in April, they will not be accepted for use in Scotland - passes issued in England will be accepted for use in England only and passes issued in Scotland will be accepted for use in Scotland only.

I would like to ask the government to take appropriate action to enable holders of bus passes issued in England to travel on busses in Scotland and holders of bus passes issued in Scotland to travel on busses in England.

These should all be UK bus passes, not separate Scottish bus passes and English bus passes. Please adress this matter ASAP.

rejection.details: The first request is a matter for the Scottish Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
